post_title: FS - 3 difficult portraits with hard to find backs.
post_content:
For Sale - Three difficult portraits with hard to find backs.  Prices listed below include postage, please message if interested and thanks for looking.

T206 Sherry Magee Portrait Sovereign 150 - SGC 2   $750 venmo friends or $775 pp gs.

T206 John Titus Portrait Sovereign 350 - SGC 1   $400 venmo friends or $415 pp gs.

T206 Sherry Magee Portrait EPDG - SGC 2   $1350 venmo friends or $1390 pp gs.

This listing will be cross posted.

Bob Intrieri
